message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its unique value, I'm asking for $22,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate the enthusiasm, but $22,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value is truly significant. How about we meet in the middle at $18,000?
I appreciate the compromise, but $18,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $14,000, but that's my final offer.
